builders.name: Criteria
builders.description: A criteria defines the conditions for data to be retrieved from the suite's data model.

builders.name: Work queue
builders.description: A work queue provides the ability to isolate and manage items that fall into target criteria. Support for adding reccommended resolutions and related research topics for the group can assist in the mitigation of these items.

builders.name: Resolution
builders.description: Define guidance and instructions for addressing high-priority issues effectively. Connect actions in order to support workflow tasks and tools within the suite.

builders.name: Card
builders.description: Choose from a variety of card types to visualize data that falls within specified criteria. Use cards to extract trends, insights, and potential risks from your supply chain data.

builders.name: Dashboard
builders.description: Select and organize cards to create optimized views tailored to unique use cases and organization structures.

builders.name: Page
builders.description: Select and organize cards to create optimized views tailored to unique use cases and organization structures.

builders.name: Message
builders.description: Develop dynamic communication templates offering comprehensive information on the risks and potential next steps associated with the triggering action or event.

builders.name: Rule
builders.description: Use criteria to configure event triggers according to specific conditions or states within your supply chain. Establish automated pipelines to oversee data imports, exports, and transformations when the associated rule is triggered and then executed.

builders.name: Custom attribute
builders.description: Add a new attributes to the suite's data model in order to integrate unique data sources and dimensions with your other data in the suite.

builders.name: Research topic
builders.description: Create smart Watson research topics for addressing high-priority items in a work queue. Topics are linked to the suite's business data in order to provide useful, in context help for mitigating the issue at hand.

builders.name: Intelligence connector
builders.description: Provides support for machine learning models to be used within the suite. The connector (machine learning model) uses data from the suite to provide input to run the model.

builders.name: Navigation
builders.description: Exposes the ability to regroup, rename and reorganize the left navigation structure to better organize the work for a range of solutions.

builders.name: Solution
builders.description: Bundles or collections of various assets that lend to solving a particular use case or cater to a specific domain would fall under a solution.

builders.name: Form
builders.description: Create dynamic forms hooked into the suite's data model to easily integrate and collaborate with your network of up and downstream vendors.
